events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and the resume looks promising with relevant experience.
The candidate's application has been categorised under Engineering based on their skills and job role preferences.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the recruitment process for this software engineer candidate.
During the initial phone screening, the candidate demonstrated strong fundamental knowledge in software development and problem-solving.
The candidate confirmed availability for the next round of interviews and expressed enthusiasm for the engineering role.
A technical coding interview has been scheduled for the candidate on 2024-05-07 at 10:00 AM.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showing expertise in algorithms and system design.
HR interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-10 to discuss the company culture and candidate's fit.
The HR interview went well; the candidate aligned with the company's values and communicated clear career goals.
An employment offer has been extended to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits.
The candidate has provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement to join the engineering team.
The candidate accepted the job offer and is ready to start the onboarding process for the software engineering role.
The onboarding process has started with document submission, account setups, and initial orientation scheduled.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the candidate fully onboarded as a new software engineer at the company.
